title: How the Americans are faring with one week to go in the Tour de France: A top-10 and King of Mountains in play
content:
Sepp Kuss is flying in the top-10, Neilson Powless is tied on King of the Mountains, and Lawson Craddock and Matteo Jorgenson both hit out for top-5s.

Read the full article at How the Americans are faring with one week to go in the Tour de France: A top-10 and King of Mountains in play on Velo.
author: ahood
